t = int(input())
while t:
    (N, M, K) = map(int, input().split())
    ti = 0
    uu = 0
    A = input().split()
    B = input().split()
    for j in range(1, N + 1):
        if str(j) not in A and str(j) not in B:
            ti += 1
        if str(j) in A and str(j) in B:
            uu += 1
    print(uu, ti)
    t = t - 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    ignored = set(map(int, input().split()))
    tracked = set(map(int, input().split()))
    print(len(ignored & tracked), n - len(ignored | tracked))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr = set(a + b)
    ans1 = set(a) & set(b)
    count = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        if i not in arr:
            count += 1
    ans2 = count
    print(len(ans1), ans2)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, ig, t) = map(int, input().split())
    ig1 = set(map(int, input().split()))
    t1 = set(map(int, input().split()))
    print(len(ig1.intersection(t1)), end=' ')
    print(n - (ig + t - len(ig1.intersection(t1))))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (a, b, c) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    arr_a = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    arr_b = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    a_set = set(arr_a)
    b_set = set(arr_b)
    total = [i for i in range(1, a + 1)]
    common_list = len(a_set.intersection(b_set))
    complete_list = list(set(arr_a + arr_b))
    rem = len(set(total) - set(complete_list))
    print(str(common_list) + ' ' + str(rem))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    set_m = set()
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    set_m.update(range(1, n + 1))
    i = set(map(int, input().split()))
    t = set(map(int, input().split()))
    set_a = i.intersection(t)
    a = set_m - i
    b = set_m - t
    set_b = a.intersection(b)
    print(len(set_a), len(set_b))

for i in range(int(input())):
    (m, k, n) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    t_f = [j for j in range(1, m + 1)]
    ignd = []
    trk = []
    unignd = []
    untrk = []
    for j in range(len(t_f)):
        if t_f[j] not in a:
            unignd.append(t_f[j])
        else:
            ignd.append(t_f[j])
        if t_f[j] not in b:
            untrk.append(t_f[j])
        else:
            trk.append(t_f[j])
    union = list(set(ignd) & set(trk))
    inter = list(set(unignd) & set(untrk))
    print(len(union), len(inter))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    ignored = list(map(int, input().split()))
    tracked = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(len(set(ignored) & set(tracked)), end=' ')
    print(len(set(range(1, n + 1)).symmetric_difference(ignored + tracked)))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, m, k) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    ignored = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    tracked = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    (i, j, c1, c2) = (0, 0, 0, 0)
    while i < m and j < k:
        if ignored[i] == tracked[j]:
            c1 += 1
            i += 1
            j += 1
        elif ignored[i] > tracked[j]:
            j += 1
        else:
            i += 1
    c2 = n - (m + k - c1)
    print(str(c1) + ' ' + str(c2))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, M, K) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    M = list(map(int, input().split()))
    K = list(map(int, input().split()))
    un_tra_ign = []
    v = list(set(M + K))
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        if i not in v:
            un_tra_ign.append(i)
    track_ign = list(set(M) & set(K))
    print(len(track_ign), len(un_tra_ign))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = set(map(int, input().split()))
    b = set(map(int, input().split()))
    z = a.intersection(b)
    j = 1
    k = 0
    o = ' '
    for i in range(n):
        if j not in a and j not in b:
            k = k + 1
        j = j + 1
    p = len(z)
    print(p, o, k)

a = int(input())
for i in range(1, a + 1):
    new = []
    str = ''
    (p, q, r) = map(int, input().split())
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = set(m)
    m.extend(n)
    b = set(m)
    t = set(n)
    king = s & t
    king = len(king)
    for i in range(1, p + 1):
        new.append(i)
    new = set(new)
    raj = new - b
    raj = len(raj)
    print(king, raj)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, m, k) = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    l1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = ''
    f1 = 0
    for i in l1:
        if i in l2:
            f1 += 1
    c += str(f1)
    f = 0
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        if i not in l1 and i not in l2:
            f += 1
    c += ' '
    c += str(f)
    print(c)

n = int(input())
for k in range(n):
    s = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = list(map(int, input().split()))
    t = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = list(set(i) & set(t))
    TnI = len(l)
    p = []
    for j in range(1, s[0] + 1):
        if j not in i and j not in t:
            p.append(i)
    nTnI = len(p)
    print(str(TnI) + ' ' + str(nTnI))

c = int(input())
for i in range(c):
    l1 = input().split(' ')
    n = int(l1[0])
    igc = int(l1[1])
    trc = int(l1[2])
    ig = input().split(' ')
    tr = input().split(' ')
    ls = [tr, ig]
    ig_tr = 0
    if igc > trc:
        ls = [ig, tr]
    j = 0
    for i in ls[1]:
        while j < len(ls[0]):
            if int(ls[0][j]) > int(i):
                break
            if int(ls[0][j]) == int(i):
                ig_tr += 1
            j += 1
    uig_utr = n - (igc + trc - ig_tr)
    print(ig_tr, uig_utr)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = set(map(int, input().split()))
    b = set(map(int, input().split()))
    c = a & b
    d = a | b
    print(len(c), n - len(d))
    t = t - 1

a = int(input())
for i in range(a):
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = set(map(int, input().split()))
    d = set(map(int, input().split()))
    e = set(range(1, b[0] + 1))
    print(len(c.intersection(d)), len(e - c.union(d)), sep=' ')

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    numbers = [int(n) for n in input().split()]
    N = [int(i) for i in range(1, numbers[0] + 1)]
    M = [int(m) for m in input().split()]
    K = [int(k) for k in input().split()]
    count = 0
    igno = 0
    for i in N:
        if i in M and i in K:
            count = count + 1
        if i not in M and i not in K:
            igno = igno + 1
    print(count, igno)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, m, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = {j + 1 for j in range(n)}
    l1 = set(map(int, input().split()))
    l2 = set(map(int, input().split()))
    x = len(l1.intersection(l2))
    y = len(l.difference(l1.union(l2)))
    print(str(x) + ' ' + str(y))
